title: Assassins Creed Unity : The Complete Edition repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
Assassin's Creed Unity Complete Edition repack Mr DJ

Repack features:

 Nothing recoded;
 Cut some Co-op files ;
 Game Version - 1.5;
 Voice Language : English;
 Subtitles: English, Russian, French, Arabic ;
 Precracked - install and play ;
 Install Time - 50 minutes [Quad Core];
 Final size: 36.4gb;
 Crack based on: RELOADED ;
 Operating system: Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (64bit only);

Minimum System Requirements:

OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8/8.1 (64bit versions only)
CPU: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz or AMD Phenom II x4 940 @ 3.0 GHz
RAM: 6 GB
VGA: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (2 GB VRAM)
DX: Version 11

I've Split the setup files into less than 4gb chunks so that u can store it on 6 DVDx5 discs .....

ALL DLCs included:

 - Quest - Chemical Revolution , The American Prisoner , Victim of Science , Camisole Prussian Soldier
 - Hood & Siege of Maastricht b Hood & Leyptsgisky Regiment , Pants National Guard , Dueling Shirt Athos
 - Black Pants Musketeer , Bracers & Latour d & Auvergne , Belt & Isenburg-Birstein , Hunting Rifle Maple
 - Spanish Rapier with a Bowl-Shaped Hilt , Double-Barrel Gun , Acute Spear , Blade of Honor
 - Battle Ax , Ax & Splitter Armor , Front Gun , Rapier & Pappenhaymer , Lance & Bow
 - Pistol with Silver Trim , French Rapier Arno , Arno Dueling Pistols
 - French Cavalry Pistol , Costume Master Assassin Style - McFarlane
 - Fearless Arno , Dead Kings / Fallen Kings DLC

**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Open 'Assassins Creed Unity Complete Edition repack Mr DJ.part1' or any other part using WinRar and extract the setup folder to any location, open the extracted folder.... 

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING 'Setup.exe' (IMPORTANT) same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Just Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

Make sure you're not low on space in C:/ drive as some temporary space (40gb) is required for unpacking ....

After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (Direct X,Visual C++ update[provided in Redist folder]),, again next,, finally on 'Install'...play from desktop shortcut.... 

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid crash/savegame issue. If it still crashes, lower the graphics settings from options ingame and make sure you meet the system requirements.

If you are still unable to get it working, feel free to ask here or drop a private message on my FB page  ....
